DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study . Chronic LBP major health care problem Denmark . Few patient receive specific diagnosis , leave majority patient diagnose non specific low back pain ( NSLBP ) . Classification system help guide treatment NSLBP . This pilot study compare manual therapy ( manipulation soft tissue treatment ) exercise classification base biopsychosocial intervention ( cognitive/functional approach ) describe Peter O ` Sullivan , subgroup call `` flexion pattern '' This pilot study three specific aim : ( ) To determine mean standard deviation numerical rating scale participant set motor control flexion pattern , sample size calculation fully power randomize control trial could perform . ( ii ) To test logistical practical procedure require perform fully power randomize control trial use two treatment . ( iii ) To gain preliminary estimate difference effect two treatment , determine result fully power randomize control trial might clinically important therefore worthwhile undertake
DOC.brief_title: `` Cognitive Functional Therapy '' vs. Manual Therapy Non-specific Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study . Chronic LBP major health care problem Denmark . Few patient receive specific diagnosis , leave majority patient diagnose non specific low back pain ( NSLBP ) . Classification system help guide treatment NSLBP.This project recruit patient , classify `` flexion pattern '' accord classification system propose Peter O´Sullivan . When classified flexion pattern patient randomize either two treatment arm . Manual therapy ( manipulation soft tissue treatment ) exercise chiropractor classification base biopsychosocial intervention do physiotherapist , ( cognitive/functional approach ) describe Peter O ` Sullivan This pilot study three specific aim : ( ) To determine mean standard deviation numerical rating scale participant set motor control flexion pattern , sample size calculation fully power randomize control trial could perform . ( ii ) To test logistical practical procedure require perform fully power randomize control trial use two treatment . ( iii ) To gain preliminary estimate difference effect two treatment , determine result fully power randomize control trial might clinically important therefore worthwhile undertake
DOC.criteria: Age 18 65 , > 3 month low back pain , Primary pain within area T12 gluteal fold . Pain provoke movement and/or physical activity . Average pain intensity last two week : 4/10 ( average last two week ) Sick leave ok , four month Adequate comprehension express Danish language Sick leave > 4 month Acute exacerbation LBP Surgery low limb within last 4 month . Hip knee osteoarthritis limit load knee hip flexion A history spinal surgery Radicular pain ( disc prolapse foraminal stenosis ) : non painful symptom leg , clinical sign alter nerve conduction ) Spinal stenosis A previous history psychiatric disease Current pregnancy Widespread nonspecific pain ( fill criterion fibromyalgia ) Imaging confirm spondylolisthesis Other disease : Rheumatoid arthritis ankylose spondylitis neurologic disease infection cancer previous history osteoporosis The patient can´t classify flexion pattern Lack compliance intervention : patient fail turn one appointment prior notice .
